Detailed Description

This is the main class for all OWL objects. It contains some methods that have to be available to all objects. Some of them can be reimplemented.
Author:
Oscar van Eijk, Oveas Functionality Provider
Version:
May 15, 2007 -- O van Eijk -- initial version

Member Function Documentation

_OWL::init (  )  [protected]

This function should be called by all constuctors. It initializes the general characteristics. Status is 'warning' by default, it's up to the contructor to set a proper status; if it's still 'warning', this *might* indicate something went wrong.

_OWL::severity (  )  [protected]

Check the status of the given object and return its severity.

_OWL::reset (  )  [protected]

General reset function for all objects. Should be called after each non-fatal error

Reimplemented in DbHandler.

$  params = array ()

_OWL::signal ( $  level = 0  ) 

Display the message for the current object status

Parameters:
[in] $level An optional severity level; message will only be displayed when it is at least of this level.
Returns:
The severity level for this object

The global Config array is referenced from every object
